answers.answer: I feel you here hun. I'm so done being pregnant. I never want to go through this again lol. I'm 38 weeks today, so not much longer until I've got my baby girl here. No more numb legs from her being on a nerve, no more nausea, heartburn, and general uncomfyness from a foot/hand in (insert organ here.) Lol. I've got all these cute little outfits and no baby to put in them. Gotta fix that! Lol :)

33 weeks today and I am also over it lol. I am ready to sleep on my tummy again, shave my legs and vagina without a mirror, I wana be able to eat and drink whatever I want (I have gestational diabetes so I can't have sugar) of course I crave every sweet thats ever been made haha. I am so ready for February to get here so we can meet our beautiful little princess!
who u telling im 39 weeks tomorrow, in a walk like an old lady.lol im just really ready for him to come on
oh gosh I'm jealous I wish I was 38 or 39 weeks!!! Lol @mommyofbabyray14 February can't come fast enough!! I also want to sleep on my stomach, shave, and bend down!!!

question: I'm soooo ready for my baby boy to be here !I can't sleep at night, I know when he comes there still won't be any sleep lol. I'm just ready to hold & kiss him . Pregnancy has made me sooo emotional, and bipolar!! Ughh I'm hot, I'm cold, I'm comfortable, I'm uncomfortable lol its just too much!!
title: 33+1 and OVER IT!!!
